title: Deaths per day in West African countries with 2014 Ebola outbreak by disease
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
The maximum Number of deaths per day 685.0 is found at Diseases HIV/AIDS and the minimum is found at Ebola where Number of deaths per day is 4.0.
There is a difference of 681.0 between the maximum Diseases HIV/AIDS and minimum Diseases Ebola.
